text:
[Verse]
Raindrops falling on my face
Splashing round in a warm embrace
Bright lights flicker in the night
Feel the rhythm take flight

[Verse 2]
Puddles form beneath our feet
Jumping high in the city street
Laughing loud with every beat
In the rain we find our sweet

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Let it wash away the pain
Life feels so insane
When we're dancing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Misty air and soaked clothes
Twirl the night until it glows
Spin around and strike a pose
In this moment nobody knows

[Verse 4]
Streetlights shining from above
Feel the magic feel the love
Raindrops fit like a glove
As we dance push comes to shove

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Let it wash away the pain
Life feels so insane
When we're dancing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
